message: I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Bob, considering the risk of inflation.

I appreciate your generosity in the previous round, Alice.  However, I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is a fairer reflection of the risks involved with inflation, especially considering the higher rate for me.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement this round.
Considering the inflation rates, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures both of us are compensated equally for the diminishing value of the money.
